articles.title: Cheeky Georgia Stanway serenades her Bayern Munich team-mates with the England anthem Sweet Caroline - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stanway's serenade comes less than two weeks after beating seven of her new team members to lift the Euro 2022 trophy, with Neil Diamond's classic chorusing around a jubilant Wembley.
articles.content:
England's Georgia Stanway poked fun at her new Bayern Munich team-mates by choosing to sing 'Sweet Caroline' as her initiation song after joining from WSL team Manchester City.

articles.title: Tyson Fury retires AGAIN just four days after revealing plans to return - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Gypsy King has fluctuated in and out the retirement he first announced following his stunning knockout victory over British rival Dillian Whyte in April.
articles.content:

articles.description: Madrid supremo Florentino Perez  was asked by a fan about whether the club would re-sign Cristiano Ronaldo, who is their record goalscorer, before he replied, 'Again? He's 38-years-old!'
